SELECT
from saas_collection_order
and order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and deleted = 0

select sbri.name,sb.mobile,sbri.gender, sbri.identity_code identityCode,soa.real_capital realCapital, datediff(so.repayment_dt,so.created_dt) applyDays, so.channel_code channelCode ,sc.channel_name channelName from saas_collection_order sco left join saas_order_application soa on sco.order_no=soa.order_numb left join saas_order so on soa.order_numb=so.order_numb left join saas_borrower sb on soa.borrower_code=sb.borrower_code left join saas_borrower_real_info sbri on soa.borrower_code=sbri.borrower_code left join saas_channel sc on so.channel_code=sc.channel_code

select count(*) from from saas_collection_order sco left join saas_order_application soa on sco.order_no=soa.order_numb left join saas_order so on soa.order_numb=so.order_numb left join saas_borrower sb on soa.borrower_code=sb.borrower_code left join saas_borrower_real_info sbri on soa.borrower_code=sbri.borrower_code
